articles.author: Nathan Vardi
articles.title: America’s richest banker says Trump is on the right track with ‘shock and awe’ tariffs - MarketWatch
articles.description: Andy Beal says, ‘Bill Ackman is wrong. We don’t need another moratorium for 90 days.’
articles.content:
Billionaire Andy Beal, the nations wealthiest banker, said on Monday that President Donald Trump should stay the course with shock and awe tariff policies that have roiled financial markets. 
In an … [+396 chars]
